game.name: Hide and Sheep
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 통계, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Hide and Sheep is a 2-10 player online multiplayer social deduction party game. Blend in with AI sheep, spot other players pretending to be sheep, and strike before they do!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Hide and Sheep is a 2-10 player online multiplayer social deduction party game. Blend in with AI sheep, spot other players pretending to be sheep, and strike before they do!
